Submissions are due by TUESDAY JULY 4 @ 23:59pm UTC

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @MinaProtocol @blockchainbeard 🤓 Hackathon details 
https://twitter.com/developer_dao/status/1671644126498963459

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 🚨 Announcing our latest Hackathon with @MinaProtocol !!
- Kick-off workshop with @blockchainbeard on Monday @ 5pm UTC
- $10,000 in Prizes (USDC, Mina, CODE)
- Learn to build zkApps
- Open to all 
RSVP for the launch workshop and full hackathon details below ⬇️ https://t.co/sVFsTfMzXq
articles.title: Re @MinaProtocol @blockchainbeard 🤓 Hackathon details https://twitter.com/developer_dao/status/1671644126498963459

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
How does Zero-Knowledge cryptography enable security, privacy and scalability on @MinaProtocol ?
We got you 🤝🏻 @blockchainbeard lays it out nicely in this clip from our recent workshop.
Don't forget, ~1.5 days left to hack on with a ~$10,000 prize pool up for grabs... deets 👇🏻 https://t.co/9257ZA85Q9

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @MinaProtocol One wallet will be used for teams but all all names in Name category.
There will be category input for each type of submission:
Dapp/Starter Kit/Tech Blog - If you only did one type, leave others blank.
Make sure you have your repos public, a solid ReadMe and licenses set MIT

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT 13 year old intern ✈️ EthCC
DM me if you're working on cool open-source projects. 
Excited to support more open-source hackers! https://twitter.com/wehack247/status/1674148792134934534

Jessy's Hacker House ⚔️ EthCC Paris 7/14-24: 📢 Big news! We're excited to officially announce the partnership with  @austingriffith and @buidlguidl to provide a monthly Universal Basic Income to builders contributing to open source and powering the Ethereum ecosystem! 💪
